description:
With the help of this application, you can easily detect typos in the text of your website to make sure the content is spelled correctly.

With the help of this application, you can easily detect typos in the text of your website to make sure the content is spelled correctly. What this application does is crawl the pages of your website and detect unknown words, marking them as spelling mistakes.

Have a website, but no budget to hire a copy editor? Vovsoft Website Spell Checker to the rescue. The spell checker will comb through your site, collecting a list of all the misspelled words and which pages they occurred on.

Never be caught with embarrassing spelling mistakes on your site. This program can crawl through your site, and identify any potential spelling mistakes.

This software is a site-wide spell checker for any website. It supports English, French, German, and can detect spelling errors in multiple languages by downloading additional .oxt dictionary files.
